article_title: Man sues Christus over loss of sight in one eye
article_text:
ACTIVATE ONLINE SUBSCRIPTION

If you have any problems, we probably need to update the phone number in your account. Please call our circulation help desk at 986-3010 or email circulation@sfnewmexican.com.

og.description: A doctor from Washington state claims he lost sight in one eye because the hospital had no surgeon available to handle an emergency procedure.
